item.title: Conception, Construction and Evaluation of a Raspberry Pi Cluster
item.author: Author
item.description: The goal of this work is to create an affordable, energy efficient and portable mini-supercomputer. Ideally, a cluster computer with little or no carbon footprint, individual elements that are inexpensive to replace, and a portable system that can be easily disassembled and reassembled.

item.title: How to get a list of PowerShell Aliases
item.author: Author
item.description:
Today I learned How to get a list of PowerShell Aliases.

An alias is an alternate name for a cmdlet, function, executable file, including scripts. PowerShell includes a set of built-in aliases. You can add your own aliases to the current session and to your PowerShell profile.

item.title: Azure Github Actions and Workflows
item.author: Author
item.description: Let me give you an introduction how to use the power of GitHub Actions and Workflows to deploy resources into Azure.
